subpanels.description: Retiolitid graptolite Gothograptus aff. domeyki in profile view with small nassa-type genicular hoods on 1st and 2nd pair of thecae. Sample K2/18.
Retiolitid graptolite Gothograptus aff. domeyki in latero-ventral view showing narrow orifices, thickened thecal lips, and a very small genicular hood on th 1. Sample K2/22.
Retiolitid graptolite Gothograptus aff. domeyki in obverse view with small genicular hoods on th11 and th12, and small lateral spines in the next two thecae. Sample K2/15.
Retiolitid graptolite Gothograptus kozlowskii showing broadened bases of the apertural spines. Sample K2/11.
Retiolitid graptolite Gothograptus kozlowskii in finite rhabdosome obverse profile view. Sample K2/13.
Retiolitid graptolite Gothograptus kozlowskii in latero-ventral (subscalariform) view. Sample K2/21.
Retiolitid graptolite Semigothograptus meganassa. Sample K2/6.
